description.text: This +1 half-plate is usually sized for a dwarf and decorated with one or more sacred hammer symbols of Torag. Once per day, the wearer may use mending, protection from evil, and spark. Once per day as a full-round action, the wearer can attempt a Knowledge check (with a +10 bonus) to identify a creature he is currently in combat with, even if he possesses no ranks in the appropriate Knowledge skill.
